metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6748 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in jsoup before 1.8.3. It was discovered that jsoup improperly handled certain HTML tags. An attacker could use this vulnerability to execute a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-6748` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjsoup-java - 1.10.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jsoup package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.2-2').
